      • doSATCollisionCheck

        public static TekCollision doSATCollisionCheck(TekCollider collider1,
                                               TekCollider collider2)
        Checks whether or not two colliders intersects using Separating Axis Theorem (SAT)
        Parameters:
        collider1 - the first collider
        collider2 - the second collider
        Returns:
        the collision object if both shapes intersect, null if they don't
